column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday August 19 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-64E at 51 MM in Franklin Co:
column4: The roadway is shutdown until further notice due to an overturned cattle trailer.

column3: I-64E at 51 MM in Franklin Co:
column4: Detour:  Exit 48/KY-151 to US-60E to US-127S, then back to I-64E.

column3: I-64E at 51 MM in Franklin Co:
column4: UPDATE 9:50 a.m. - The eastbound left lane is now open.
